adventurer.title: Adventurer
adventurer.x4: Opening a chest regenerates 30% Max HP over 5s.

archaicpetra.title: Archaic Petra
archaicpetra.x4: Upon obtaining an Elemental Shard created through a Crystallize Reaction, all party members gain 35% DMG Bonus for that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental DMG Bonus can be gained in this manner at any one time.

berserker.title: Berserker
berserker.x4: When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%.

blizzardstrayer.title: Blizzard Strayer
blizzardstrayer.x4: When a character attacks an opponent affected by Cryo, their CRIT Rate is increased by 20%. If the opponent is Frozen, CRIT Rate is increased by an additional 20%.

bloodstainedchivalry.title: Bloodstained Chivalry
bloodstainedchivalry.x4: After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s. Also triggers with wild animals such as boars, squirrels and frogs.

braveheart.title: Brave Heart
braveheart.x4: Increases DMG by 30% against opponents with more than 50% HP.

crimsonwitchofflames.title: Crimson Witch of Flames
crimsonwitchofflames.x4: Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Skill increases the 2-Piece Set Bonus by 50% of its starting value for 10s. Max 3 stacks.

defenderswill.title: Defender's Will
defenderswill.x4: For each different element present in your own party, the wearer's Elemental RES to that corresponding element is increased by 30%.

echoesofanoffering.title: Echoes of an Offering
echoesofanoffering.x4: When Normal Attacks hit opponents, there is a 36% chance that it will trigger Valley Rite, which will increase Normal Attack DMG by 70% of ATK. This effect will be dispelled 0.05s after a Normal Attack deals DMG. If a Normal Attack fails to trigger Valley Rite, the odds of it triggering the next time will increase by 20%. This trigger can occur once every 0.2s.

emblemofseveredfate.title: Emblem of Severed Fate
emblemofseveredfate.x4: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by 25% of Energy Recharge. A maximum of 75% bonus DMG can be obtained in this way.

gambler.title: Gambler
gambler.x4: Defeating an opponent has 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.

gladiatorsfinale.title: Gladiator's Finale
gladiatorsfinale.x4: If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%.

heartofdepth.title: Heart of Depth
heartofdepth.x4: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 30% for 15s.

huskofopulentdreams.title: Husk of Opulent Dreams
huskofopulentdreams.x4: A character equipped with this Artifact set will obtain the Curiosity effect in the following conditions:> **1)** When on the field, the character gains 1 stack after hitting an opponent with a Geo attack, triggering a maximum of once every 0.3s.> **2)** When off the field, the character gains 1 stack every 3s.> **3)** Curiosity can stack up to 4 times, each providing 6% DEF and a 6% Geo DMG Bonus.> **4)** When 6 seconds pass without gaining a Curiosity stack, 1 stack is lost.

instructor.title: Instructor
instructor.x4: Upon triggering an Elemental Reaction, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.

lavawalker.title: Lavawalker
lavawalker.x4: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro by 35%.

maidenbeloved.title: Maiden Beloved
maidenbeloved.x4: Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.

martialartist.title: Martial Artist
martialartist.x2: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 15%.
martialartist.x4: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.

noblesseoblige.title: Noblesse Oblige
noblesseoblige.x4: Using an Elemental Burst increases all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.

oceanhuedclam.title: Ocean-Hued Clam
oceanhuedclam.x4: When the character equipping this artifact set heals a character in the party, a Sea-Dyed Foam will appear for 3 seconds, accumulating the amount of HP recovered from healing (including overflow healing). At the end of the duration, the Sea-Dyed Foam will explode, dealing DMG to nearby opponents based on 90% of the accumulated healing. (This DMG is calculated similarly to Reactions such as Electro-Charged, and Superconduct, but it is not affected by Elemental Mastery, Character Levels, or Reaction DMG Bonuses). Only one Sea-Dyed Foam can be produced every 3.5 seconds. Each Sea-Dyed Foam can accumulate up to 30,000 HP (including overflow healing). There can be no more than one Sea-Dyed Foam active at any given time. This effect can still be triggered even when the character who is using this artifact set is not on the field.

paleflame.title: Pale Flame
paleflame.x4: When an Elemental skill hits an opponent, ATK is increased by 9% for 7s. This effect stacks up to 2 times and can be triggered once every 0.3s. Once 2 stacks are reached, 2-set effect is doubled.

resolutionofsojourner.title: Resolution of Sojourner
resolutionofsojourner.x4: Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%.

retracingbolide.title: Retracing Bolide
retracingbolide.x4: While protected by a shield, gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG.

scholar.title: Scholar
scholar.x4: Gaining Elemental Particles or Orbs gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occur once every 3s.

shimenawareminiscence.title: Shimenawa's Reminiscence
shimenawareminiscence.x4: When casting an Elemental Skill, if the character has 15 or more Energy, they lose 15 Energy and Normal/Charged/Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 50% for 10s. This effect will not trigger again during that duration.

tenacityofthemillelith.title: Tenacity of the Millelith
tenacityofthemillelith.x4: When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the ATK of all nearby party members is increased by 20% and their Shield Strength is increased by 30% for 3s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s. This effect can still be triggered even when the character who is using this artifact set is not on the field.

theexile.title: The Exile
theexile.x4: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for all party members (excluding the wearer) every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack.

thunderingfury.title: Thundering Fury
thunderingfury.x4: Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged and Superconduct by 40%. Triggering such effects decreases Elemental Skill CD by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.

thundersoother.title: Thundersoother
thundersoother.x4: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Electro by 35%.

tinymiracle.title: Tiny Miracle
tinymiracle.x4: Incoming Elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.

vermillionhereafter.title: Vermillion Hereafter
vermillionhereafter.x4: After using an Elemental Burst, this character will gain the Nascent Light effect, increasing their ATK by 8% for 16s. When the character's HP decreases, their ATK will further increase by 10%. This increase can occur this way maximum of 4 times. This effect can be triggered once every 0.8s. Nascent Light will be dispelled when the character leaves the field. If an Elemental Burst is used again during the duration of Nascent Light, the original Nascent Light will be dispelled.

viridescentvenerer.title: Viridescent Venerer
viridescentvenerer.x4: Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent's Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s.

wandererstroupe.title: Wanderer's Troupe
wandererstroupe.x4: Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or Bow.
